title: THE CITY YOU LIVE IN & like to watch

singleItemContent: What city do you live in?
Do you like this city? Why?
How long have you lived in this city?
Are there big changes in this city/
Is this city your permanent residence?
Are there people of different ages living in this city?
Describe a sports program you like to watch
Who you like to watch this program with
And explain why you like to watch this program
Which sport do you think most people like to do?
What are the benefits of exercise?
What can be done to get children into sport?
What sports programs do people like to watch in your country?
What’s the difference between watching sports on TV and watching it live?
